name: natspec-markdown-ui
description: A monorepo template built with Bun, Hono, Vite, React, and Forge
author: Steve Simkins

scripts.dev: concurrently "bun run dev:shared" "bun run dev:server" "bun run dev:client"

scripts.postinstall: bun run build:shared && bun run build:server
